user_query: I'm planning a trip to New York City next month and I want to check the local headlines there. Can you provide me with the latest news for New York City? Also, fetch the draw result for the lotto game in the US on January 1, 2023.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest local headlines for New York City.
Fetch the lotto draw results for the US on January 1, 2023.
